titleStmt.title: An excellent new ballad, shewing the petigree of our royall King Iames the first of that name in England. To the tune of, Gallants all come mourne with mee.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "England with chearfull hart giue eare,".
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reels 740 and 1522 (British Library copy).
